title: Land Stolen by Builder

options.explanation: When local police refuse to act, escalating to the SP or DM is effective. The SP can mandate an FIR under Section 154 of the CrPC, while the DM, as a revenue authority, can address land disputes. This ensures legal action without delays or corruption.
